name: EXECUTE DADDY～パパが何度も死ぬゲーム～
name_original: EXECUTE DADDY～パパが何度も死ぬゲーム～
description:
Explore a time-stopped execution tower with cute boy!　Encounter different endings!


In this ADV game, you play the role of an administrator of the World of the Deceased who has lost your memory and body, and through executing sinnes and comforting the deceased, he tries to regain your lost memory and body.

The sinner who come back to life after various executions are cute, and their executions are like a show.
Who is this mysterious sinner and why have you lost your memory and body? The answer to this mystery can be found beyond. The show must go on! Now let's get on with the show of executing the cutest sinner right away!




Administrator of the World of the Deceased:
You. You have lost your memory and your body, and you don't know anything. But you are obliged to execute sinner and entertain the departed. The show must go on!



Sinner：
He may not seem young in real age, but he is strangely cute. He is undaunted no matter how many times he is executed. May have some kind of relationship with you.



Valet：
He is a cute doggy-like male who pampers you unconditionally. Why he likes you is a mystery.



■ Execute the cutesy criminal with flair!
Execute the execution commands to raise the soul points of the deceased.


■Explore and you'll find out what it's all about.
Explore this world that makes no sense and look for clues to the mystery.


Translation cooperation：猫狗累(nekogurui)＆うにか(unica)
